Welcome to KUAS AP API’s documentation!¶

Contents:

This module provide three kuas online system api. AP system, bus system, and leave system.

This module ap provide manipulate of kuas AP system.

kuas.ap.AP_BASE_URL = 'http://140.127.113.227'¶

AP sytem base url

kuas.ap.AP_LOGIN_URL = 'http://140.127.113.227/kuas/perchk.jsp'¶

AP system login url

kuas.ap.AP_QUERY_URL = 'http://140.127.113.227/kuas/%s_pro/%s.jsp?'¶

AP system general query url, with two args, first: prefix of qid, second: qid

kuas.ap.LOGIN_TIMEOUT = 1.0¶

Login timeout

kuas.ap.QUERY_TIMEOUT = 5.0¶

Query timeout

kuas.ap.login(session, username, password)[source]¶

Login to KUAS AP system.

Parameters:
  • session (class requests.sessions.Session) – requests session object
  • username (str or int) – username of kuas ap system, actually your kuas student id
  • password (str or int) – password of kuas ap system.
Returns:

login status
Return type:

bool

Login with correct username and password

>>> s = requests.Session()
>>> login(s, "guest", "123")
True

Login with bad username or password

>>> login(s, "guest", "777")
False
kuas.ap.query(session, qid, args=None)[source]¶

Query AP system page by qid and args

Parameters:
  • session (class requests.sessions.Session) – requests session object, the session must login first.
  • qid (str) – query id of ap system page
  • args (dict) – arguments of query post

:return” content of query page :rtype: str

You must login first when using query Otherwise ap system won’t let you use it.

>>> s = requests.Session()
>>> content = query(s, "ag222", {"arg01": "103", "arg02": "2"})
>>> "Please Logon" in content
True

Login to guest

>>> login(s, "guest", "123")
True

Query course data (ag202)

>>> args = {"yms_yms": "103#2", "dgr_id": "14", "unt_id": "UC02",                 "clyear": "", "sub_name": "", "teacher": "", "week": 2,                 "period": 4, "reading": "reading"}
>>> content = query(s, "ag202", args)
>>> "內部控制暨稽核制度" in content
True
kuas.ap.status()[source]¶

Return AP server status code

Return type:int
Returns:A HTTP status code 
>>> status()
200
kuas.bus.login(session, username, password)[source]¶

Login to KUAS Bus system.

Parameters:
  • session (class requests.sessions.Session) – requests session object
  • username (str or int) – username of kuas bus system, actually your kuas student id
  • password (str or int) – password of kuas ap system.
Returns:

login status
Return type:

bool
kuas.bus.query(session, y, m, d, operation='全部')[source]¶

Query kuas bus timetable

Parameters:
  • session (class requests.sessions.Session) – requests session object
  • y (int) – year, using common era
  • m (int) – month
  • d (int) – day
  • operation (str) – choosing bus start from yanchao or jiangong, or all.
 
>>> s = requests.Session()
>>> login(s, "1102108133", "111")
True

>>> type(query(s, "2015", "6", "15"))
<class 'list'>

>>> type(query(s, *'2014-10-08'.split("-")))
<class 'list'>
kuas.bus.reserve(session)[source]¶

Query user reserve bus.

kuas.bus.status()[source]¶

Return Bus server status code

Return type:int
Returns:A HTTP status code 
>>> status()
200
